title: Calories in Split Peas
meta_description: Learn calories in split peas per 100g cooked, plus carbs, protein, fiber, and full nutrition details with tweaks for recipes.
assumptions: Cooked green split peas, boiled without salt or added fat, drained; standard serving basis.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by type (green/yellow), cooking method, added ingredients, and brand. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100g of cooked split peas provides ~118 kcal, 8g protein, and 8g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

Use dry split peas (uncooked weight equivalent)

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g cooked split peas?
faqs.a: About 118 kcal per 100g cooked split peas.

faqs.q: Are split peas high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, ~8.3g protein per 100g cooked, making them a good plant-based source.

faqs.q: What's the fiber content in split peas?
faqs.a: Around 8.3g dietary fiber per 100g cooked, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: Do split peas have fat or cholesterol?
faqs.a: Very low fat (0.4g per 100g) and 0mg cholesterol.

faqs.q: Calories in dry vs cooked split peas?
faqs.a: Dry: ~341 kcal per 100g; cooked: ~118 kcal per 100g due to water absorption.
